    • getProgramText

      public String getProgramText()
      Builds up a string representation of the program text being held in this tree.

      This does not take AreaTag.COMMENTs into account.

    • getAllText

      public String getAllText()

    • getData

    • allTokens

      public Iterable<Token> allTokens()
      Gives you an Iterable for all Tokens found anywhere in this tree, in depth-first order.

    • allTokens

      public Iterable<Token> allTokens(TokenFilter filter)
      Gives you an Iterable for Tokens found anywhere in this tree which pass the given TokenFilter, in depth-first order.

    • childTokens

      public Iterable<Token> childTokens()
      Gives you an Iterable for all child Tokens found in this tree, in original order.

    • childTokens

      public Iterable<Token> childTokens(TokenFilter filter)
      Gives you an Iterable for child Tokens found in this tree which pass the given TokenFilter, in original order.

    • childData

      public Iterable<Data> childData()
      Gives you an Iterable for child Data found in this tree, in original order.

    • childTrees

      public Iterable<Tree> childTrees()
      Gives you an Iterable for child Trees found in this tree, in original order.

    • getStartPosition

      public Position getStartPosition()
      Searches the tree for the first known start position.

      This does not take AreaTag.COMMENTs into account.

    • getStartToken

      public Token getStartToken()
      Searches the tree for the first non-AreaTag.COMMENT token.

    • getRawStartToken

      public Token getRawStartToken()
      Searches the tree for the first known token.

    • getRawStart

      public Position getRawStart()
      Searches the tree for the last known end position.

    • getEndPosition

      public Position getEndPosition()
      Searches the tree for the last known end position.

      This does not take AreaTag.COMMENTs into account.

    • getEndToken

      public Token getEndToken()
      Searches the tree for the last known end non-AreaTag.COMMENT token.

    • getRawEndToken

      public Token getRawEndToken()
      Searches the tree for the last known token.

      Searches the tree for the last known end position.
